PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-08722021-08-11PS,  CBSA,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to enhance the clarity and consistency of Part 16 of the Regulations by (1) amending the notice of seizure provision to require that written notification and reasons be provided to the person from whom the item was seized, in addition to the lawful owner; (2) eliminating the two separate timelines for submitting an application to request the return of a seized item, and create one 60 day timeline for both types of applicants (lawful owner or the person from whom the item was seized), that begins on upon notice of seizure as opposed to upon the seizure itself; (3) specifying that the lawful owner's application will take priority in a circumstance where the person from whom the item was seized also applies for return of the item; (4) arranging the return provisions into two categories; and (5) repealing a certain number of provisions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0202 Publication Date: 2021-09-01
AttachmentsAttachment
